name: Garments Order Production Tracker System
description: A system to track garment orders and production workflow, designed for efficiency in the textile industry.
challenges: Managing complex order states and ensuring real-time updates across multiple users.
improvements: Add AI-driven analytics for production forecasting and integrate with ERP systems.

name: Book Library
description: A digital library platform where users can browse, borrow, and manage books online.
challenges: Implementing secure authentication and handling dynamic book categories.
improvements: Introduce personalized recommendations and collaborative reading lists.

name: Toy Topia
description: An e-commerce platform for toys, featuring product listings, authentication, and order management.
challenges: Optimizing performance for large product catalogs and ensuring smooth checkout flow.
improvements: Add AR-based toy previews and advanced search filters.
